head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVERO, ANGELES ALCOVER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RIVERO, ANGELES ALCOVER

block.p: RIVERO-Angeles Alcover. Beloved wife of the late Armando P. Rivero, devoted mother of Yolanda Rivero and Isis Hoffman, loving grandmother of Elena, Cristina, Terry and Alicia, great-grandmother of Sam, Nate, Max and Tommy, and sister-in-law of Alicia Rivero, died July 25, 2000. Viewing Gere Cronin Funeral Home, 115 Atlantic Ave, Brooklyn Heights, Thursday, July 27, 2-5PM, 7-9PM. Funeral Mass, Friday, July 28, 9:30AM at St. Charles Borromeo Church, Brooklyn Heights.
